item.title: Why the president has put Russian nuclear forces on a higher state of alertness https://t.co/BVALnNecSs

My piece on Putin's order to move nuclear forces to a "special mode of combat duty". In peacetime Russia's command system can't transmit launch orders. Raising alert is "connecting the wires, so if a launch order is issued it can go through”—@russianforces https://t.co/nT6NXiHOyQ
